```{r include=FALSE}
require(tidyverse)
require(tigerstats)
require(knitr)
newdata<- read.csv(file="clinicalTrial.csv")
```

```{r eval=FALSE}
newdata <- newdata %>%
mutate(across(where(is.character), as.factor))
```
## Graphical Analysis
```{r}
barchartGC(~infected + vaxStatus,data=newdata)
barchartGC(~infected + vaxStatus,newdata, type="percent")

```
